NAME: Gel
AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Search http://gelbooru.com/ for anime pictures.

Usage: [p]gel [tags...]: Fetch the latest image
[p]gelr [tags...]: Fetch a random image
[p]gelfilter list: Lists all filters applied to the server
[p]gelfilter add [filter name]: Add a filter to the server
[p]gelfilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter from the server

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
